name: Parking Payment Report
query:
select invoice.posting_date as `Date:Date:100`, cust.customer_name as `Customer Name:Data:150`, cust.relation_to as `Relation:Data:30`, cust.relation_name as `Relation Name:Data:150`, addr.address_line1 as `Customer Address 1:Data:150`, addr.address_line2 as `Customer Address 2:Data:150`, addr.city as `Customer City:Data:100`, addr.state as `Customer State:Data:100`, addr.pincode as `Pincode:Data:75`, replace(replace(invoice.address_display,'\n',''),'
','\n') as `Invoice Address:Text:200`, concat(cust.customer_name,'\n',cust.relation_to,' ',cust.relation_name, '\n', replace(replace(invoice.address_display,'\n',''),'
','\n')) as `Customer Details:Text:200`, item.item_code as `Model:Data:100`, item.rate as `Rate:Float:100`, if(item.is_electric_vehicle=1, 'YES', 'NO') as `Electric Vehicle:Data:75`, if(addr.city like 'Ind%%' and addr.pincode like '4520%%',500,'N.A.') as `Parking:Data:75` from `tabCustomer` cust, `tabAddress` addr, `tabSales Invoice` invoice, `tabSales Invoice Item` item where item.parent = invoice.name and cust.name = invoice.customer and invoice.docstatus = 1 and invoice.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s and item.is_vehicle = 1 and addr.name = invoice.customer_address
